short_summary: Lab equipment for catalyst coated membrane (CCM), gas diffusion electrode (GDE), polymer membrane
description: A bench top ultrasonic coating system for manufacture of catalyst coated membrane (CCM), gas diffusion electrode (GDE), polymer membrane. A Microsoft Window base integrated program control system including: ultrasonic probes to generate mist for coating, syringe pumps to dispense liquid, a heated vacuum table to hold samples for coating, a gantry system to move spray nozzle probe, spray pattern. All the deliverables must be received on or before September 30, 2023.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement: Benchtop Ultrasonic Spray Coater**

**Reference Number**: WS3799547509-Doc3799562722

**Solicitation Number**: WS3799547509

**Publication Date**: January 18, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: March 6, 2023, 14:00 (Eastern Time)

**Amendment Date**: February 28, 2023

**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**GFN as Contracting Authority**

**Notice Type**: Invitation to Bid

**Background**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide a benchtop ultrasonic coating system for the manufacture of catalyst coated membrane (CCM), gas diffusion electrode (GDE), and polymer membrane. 

**Scope of Work**

The contractor is required to provide a benchtop ultrasonic coating system with a Microsoft Windows-based integrated control system. The system shall include:

* Ultrasonic probes to generate a fine mist for coating
* Syringe pumps to dispense liquid
* A heated vacuum table to hold samples for coating
* A gantry system to move a spray nozzle probe and spray pattern

**Key Requirements**

* Deliverables shall be received on or before September 30, 2023
* The system shall be designed for high precision and reliability

**Instructions to Bidders**

Bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically through the Ariba contract portal (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15157190?extsite=MTUxNTcxOTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Contact Information**

For further information regarding this tender notice, please contact:
Katie Wong

PSPC / TPSGC
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec
K1A 0S5

Phone: None
Fax: None
Email: [katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Evaluation Criteria**

Proposals will be evaluated solely on the basis of the lowest price submitted. The contract award will be made to the bidder that submits the lowest price.



   ***This contract notice is subject to change***. Addendum/Correction to Solicitation Documents may be issued and will be subsequently posted on buyandsell.gc
